tracks.text: Greg Davies, the Taskmaster, types at a typewriter. Scenes from the show play, depicting the 5 contestants with absurd situations, costumes, and reactions.
A baby head wearing a succulent hat sitting on a pile of golf balls in a baby carriage. Text appears. Some impropriety?
A wooden platform with legs to go over an elephant's back. There's an arm rest, back rest, and drawers.
The cone rests on a woman's bicep, and stops at the wrist
A metal trough with a green tint.
A tent stands in a field. It could comfortably fit one man standing upright. Across the field, a rubber ducky sits on a platform.
The contestants separately walk across the field, each wearing a white bonnet that restricts their vision. They can only see straight ahead.
Alex unzips the tent
A censored object on wheels rolls into Steve's legs
John turns around. An inflatable pink blob man with yellow polka dots and a bow tie stands on the cart. It's arms are outstretched. The top of its head is even with John's shoulders.
John runs, and Mister Blobby's cart chases
Mister Blobby turns away from Steve and drives for Alex.
Alex jumps out of the way
Mister Blobby drives over the duck platform, knocking it down
Alex and Greg point to Greg
Alex shakes his head
Steve 5
In front of the house, a black canister of water is labelled BABY. It sits in a baby diaper. Nearby is a blackboard with 6 tasks. The contestants each wear front facing baby carriers.
Her face falls
She leans forward, and water drips out
Sophie moves slowly and deliberately into the caravan
Alex looks around
Joanne drops a laundry hamper
She kneels down, holding the water baby upright, and picks up the cloth.
Sophie dumps the hamper over a drying rack
Sophie uses the laundry to clean mud of Greg's statue's shoes.
She uses the water baby to wet the cloth
Joanne vacuums a carpet square. Sophie shakes a bottle of white liquid
They change the water baby's diapers
She pours baby formula in a bottle and shakes it
Steve pulls rope from a shed
Alex holds one end of the rope. Steve throws his jacket over it and walks away.
Steve shakes the carpet. Nick whacks the carpet against a cow.
They mix formula
Steve pours the formula into his water baby
Nick mimes feeding the baby
He gingerly removes the carrier from his chest, and places it on the pedestal.
He spills formula
He picks up the baby and carrier
The diaper is changed, and the carrier is reassembled
John puts his face in his hands
Shots of various baby heads, all wearing different succulents as hats. The task takes place in the Study.
Alex stares at her
Alex averts his gaze
Sophie looks around as Alex stares at her
Alex bites his lip
John hugs Alex
Nick looks around. Alex produces an envelope
Sophie stands by the door
Sophie stares forward, then walks around
Alex sits in Joanne's lap, facing her
Sophie stands on a chair
She balances on one leg
Sophie balances a porcelain cup on her head and struggles to balance on one leg
John and Alex stand apart, with cables stretching between them
Alex gives thumbs up
Joanne sits in Alex's lap. They move their hands in circles while Alex looks uncomfortable
Joanne stares at him
Joanne rests her head against Alex's
Sophie holds a candle
Joanne holds Alex
Joanne walks off
Greg pats Alex's knee
She stands
Greg sits. Sophie brings over her chair and climbs on it.
Greg stares blankly
Nick, dressed as Dracula, places a checkered cloth on the Study table.
He arranges 4 candles, and places eggs on top of each.
The candles sit in coupe wine glasses.
He walks to the table with a stick
He knocks the candlesticks away. The eggs drop
And break on the table. Nick recoils.
He places the wine glasses over the cracked eggs, then pulls the table cloth.
The eggs and glasses fly off the table. Nick jumps aside, tripping over filming equipment.
Broken eggs and glasses lie on the floor.
Sophie
Cinema style aspect ratio and lighting
Loser's meal: Yoghurt
Cheese
Hot sauce
They shake hands
Alex draws a hangman base
Steve writes 2 T's in his 8 letter word
Alex's 9 letter word begins with N
N space G H space C
Steve is ahead by 3 strokes
Steve finishes the hung man drawing
Steve hands Alex a spoon
Steve writes "Adjutant"
He drops the pen and walks away. Alex stares down.
Steve 13, Nick 8
Sophie and Nick high 5
The contestants wear boxes on different parts of the body. They stand behind pedestals with 20 spring launcher monsters each.
He stands on one leg
She moves to catch a monster with her shoulder. It bounces off her, and she knocks over the whole pedestal.
Sophie tries to catch one launched from the ground, but falls over
John catches one with his elbow
Sophie catches one with a knee
Nick catches another with his elbow
One bounces off John's head. Joanne has one on her head.
For John
For Sophie
For Nick
For Steve
Greg removes his glasses. Nick looks scared.
A monster bounces out of Nick's elbow. He puts in back in and makes a shushing gesture
Monster launched after whistle
Steve 17, Nick 10, Sophie 9
He stands on one leg
Credits roll
John picks up the manequin with the cone.
He shows off treats in a timed cat feeder
He sits in the trough
He sits in the elephant chair, legs up, with the coned manequin in his lap.
He smiles and gives a thumbs up
